name: Ultimate Ball
description:
This is a complete simulation of the physical laws of the real world, through the design of different routes, build different structures, let the ball fly to the end of the game as soon as possible!
Each level in the game has different level components available for use, through translation, rotation to change their position and shape, click [Start] after the ball begins to fall naturally, let the ball successfully reach the end of the game victory! The less time it takes the ball to reach the end point, the higher the level score. Usually there are many ways to finish each level
Try as many solutions as you can and use your imagination to come up with surprising solutions.
Race a friend to see who can reach the finish line in less time!
